price: (Ɔkͻmhyεni), Yεnyεε onipa biara nnii w’anim kan sԑ ᴐbԑtena (wiase) afe bͻͻ. Enti sε wowu a wͻn deε wͻbεtena (wiase) afe bͻͻ anaa?
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا لِبَشَرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ ٱلۡخُلۡدَۖ أَفَإِيْن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalnā libasharin min qablika al-khul'da afa-in mitta fahumu al-khālidūna
